hero.subtitle: Celebrating excellence in cocoa production and chocolate craftsmanship through rigorous evaluation and industry recognition.

home.sectionSubtitle: Our competition brings together the finest cocoa producers, chocolatiers, and industry experts to celebrate quality and innovation.

quality.title: Quality Excellence
quality.description: Promoting the highest standards in cocoa and chocolate production worldwide.

expert.title: Expert Judges
expert.description: International panel of certified chocolate professionals and industry experts.

fair.title: Fair Evaluation
fair.description: Transparent and standardized evaluation process for all participants.

recognition.title: Recognition
recognition.description: Winners receive prestigious awards and industry recognition.

cta.heading: Ready to Showcase Your Quality?
cta.subtitle: Join our community of cocoa and chocolate professionals committed to excellence.

contest.title: Contest Management
contest.subtitle: Create and manage competition contests

validation.invalidDateDesc: End date must be on or after the start date.

contest.empty: No contests created yet. Create your first contest!

roleMsg.admin: Welcome to the Administrator Dashboard. Manage users, contests, and oversee the entire competition platform.
roleMsg.director: Welcome to the Director Dashboard. Coordinate samples, manage judges, and oversee evaluation stages.
roleMsg.judge: Welcome to the Judge Dashboard. Evaluate submitted samples and contribute to quality assessment.
roleMsg.participant: Welcome to the Participant Dashboard. Submit your samples and track your competition results.
roleMsg.evaluator: Welcome to the Evaluator Dashboard. Assess samples and view comprehensive results.

physicalEvaluation.title: Physical Evaluation
physicalEvaluation.subtitle: Comprehensive physical evaluation with automatic disqualification rules

paymentRequired.title: Payment Required
paymentRequired.description: Physical evaluation is locked until payment is completed.
paymentRequired.instruction: Please complete payment in Sample Management to unlock physical evaluation.

paymentWarning.title: Unpaid Samples Detected
paymentWarning.description: {{count}} sample(s) require payment before physical evaluation.
paymentWarning.instruction: Complete payment in Sample Management to unlock all samples for evaluation.

evaluationForm.title: Physical Parameters Evaluation
evaluationForm.description: Complete physical evaluation with automatic disqualification rules applied

odorChecklist.title: 1. Odor Checklist
odorChecklist.description: Select observed odors. Any Atypical odor will mark "undesirable aromas" and cause disqualification.

violatedGrains.title: 4. Violated Grains
violatedGrains.description: Internal exposure or structural damage (disqualification if detected)
violatedGrains.label: Violated grains detected

fermentation.title: 7. Fermentation Analysis
fermentation.description: Combined well-fermented + lightly fermented must be ≥ 60%

notes.title: Evaluation Notes
notes.placeholder: Enter any additional observations or notes

passed.title: Sample Passes Physical Evaluation
passed.description: All physical parameters meet the required standards

samplesList.description: Click on a sample to start or continue physical evaluation

noSamples.description: No samples are ready for physical evaluation.

qrVerification.verifiedDescription: This QR code is authentic and corresponds to a valid sample submission in our system.
qrVerification.noteDescription: This verification confirms the authenticity of the sample and its registration in the cocoa competition system. For detailed evaluation results, please contact the competition organizers.
